originalText.text: Both my children have attended this school and have had a wonderful experience. They meet the needs of all different levels and kinds of learners in the classrooms AND they care deeply about the social-emotional development of the students during these challenging middle school years. And it's one of the few schools in the district that actually has a population representative of the demographics of the district. I highly recommend MHII!!

originalText.text: After being a student there for three years I have come to love Mott Hall II, whether it's the amazing teachers or the high standards for each individual student.

text.text: After being a student there for three years I have come to love Mott Hall II, whether it's the amazing teachers or the high standards for each individual student.

originalText.text: The dean of this school is always saying that he’s trying to help someone who gets in trouble, yet he’s only making the situation worse. Honestly I don’t really like the people at this school. I keep my social circle small and it helps a lot.

originalText.text: Great school! Wonderful people. Really nice environment. Welcome you like family!
